annotation.spannedText: The best protection against mumps is the MMR vaccine

classMention.mentionClass: The best protection against mumps is the MMR vaccine

annotation.spannedText: The mumps vaccine is one of the components of the MMR vaccine, which protects against mumps, measles and rubella

classMention.mentionClass: The mumps vaccine is one of the components of the MMR vaccine, which protects against mumps, measles and rubella

annotation.spannedText: If you haven't had any or both doses of the MMR vaccine, whatever age you are, make an appointment with your GP surgery to have the vaccine

classMention.mentionClass: If you haven't had any or both doses of the MMR vaccine, whatever age you are, make an appointment with your GP surgery to have the vaccine

annotation.spannedText: The mumps virus can spread very quickly and anyone who has not had two doses of MMR vaccine is at higher risk of catching mumps

classMention.mentionClass: The mumps virus can spread very quickly and anyone who has not had two doses of MMR vaccine is at higher risk of catching mumps

annotation.spannedText: Most cases of mumps are in older teenagers and young adults so it's especially important that people in this age group are fully vaccinated, especially if they are planning to go to college or university

classMention.mentionClass: Most cases of mumps are in older teenagers and young adults so it's especially important that people in this age group are fully vaccinated, especially if they are planning to go to college or university

annotation.spannedText: Mumps cases may rise again in the next few years if people who aren't vaccinated, or only partially vaccinated don't get both doses of MMR vaccine

classMention.mentionClass: Mumps cases may rise again in the next few years if people who aren't vaccinated, or only partially vaccinated don't get both doses of MMR vaccine

annotation.spannedText: Anyone who hasn't received MMR vaccination as a child, or has only received one dose, should go to their GP or college doctor and get the vaccination straight away

classMention.mentionClass: Anyone who hasn't received MMR vaccination as a child, or has only received one dose, should go to their GP or college doctor and get the vaccination straight away
